key.name: shutdown-max-timer-value
key.description: Set shutdown time. Use only values greater than zero.

key.name: wake-interval-value
key.description: Set interval value for shutdown time. Use only values greater than zero.

key.name: shutdown-timestamp-value
key.description: Unix time in seconds of scheduled shutdown or -1 if disabled.

key.name: show-textboxes-value
key.description: Show/hide notification text boxes on screen.

key.name: root-mode-value
key.description: Set root mode on/off. In root mode powering off is done via 'pkexec' and 'shutdown' terminal command.

key.name: show-shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Comma-separated shutdown modes which are shown in the popup menu

key.name: shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Mode to use for timer action
